summary:
Vancouver is a big city in western Canada, with over 660,000 people. It's the most populous city in British Columbia and the third-largest metro area in Canada. With many different cultures and languages, it's one of Canada's most diverse cities. People love living there because it's often ranked as one of the best places to live in the world.

The city has a long history, starting with Indigenous settlements over 10,000 years ago. It was founded in 1867 and named after Captain George Vancouver. The city grew quickly with the arrival of the Canadian Pacific Railway. Today, it's known for its beautiful natural setting, busy seaport, and film industry.
title: Vancouver
